rahu_kalam: Approximate Rahu Kalam is from 4:30 PM to 6:00 PM
day_summary: The day is generally considered auspicious for new beginnings.
day_significance: This day is significant as it falls in the auspicious Shukla Paksha of the month of Pushya. It is a time when many people perform rituals and prayers to seek blessings for prosperity and well-being. The Panchami Tithi is often associated with growth and new ventures. Shravana Nakshatra is known for its nurturing qualities, making it a good day for family gatherings and spiritual activities. Many devotees may choose to visit temples and engage in charitable acts. The energies of the day support positive actions and intentions.
marriage_muhurat: There are favorable timings available for marriage ceremonies today.
house_warming_muhurat: Good timings are available for house warming ceremonies today.
vehicle_purchase_muhurat: Auspicious timings are present for purchasing vehicles today.
business_start_muhurat: There are favorable timings for starting new business ventures today.
